subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ expected starting rotation, led by C. C. Sabathia (6 feet 7 inches, 290 pounds) and Michael Pineda (6-7, 280), is among the biggest in baseball history.
snippet: The Yankees’ expected starting rotation, led by C. C. Sabathia (6 feet 7 inches, 290 pounds) and Michael Pineda (6-7, 280), is among the biggest in baseball history.
